Visualize¶

Symbolic visualization of knitting piece¶

For a symbolical visualization of a knitting piece you can use easygraph. Example is given by test test_visualize

Spatial (3D) visualization of knitting piece¶

For a spatial visualization of knitting piece use easygraph. Example is given by test test_visualize
